sentence.Network_en: Earthquake struck Szechwan of China, and led to many people die.
sentence.Network_cn: 地震侵袭中国大陆的四川, 导致许多人死亡.

sentence.Network_en: I've tried Cantonese, Hunan and Szechwan food and they differ quite considerably.
sentence.Network_cn: 我试过广东, 湖南和四川菜,他们都颇为不同.

sentence.Network_en: This Belgian, at Szechwan city, meat market, rent a file, selling pork.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个比利时人, 就在四川成都市, 肉菜市场, 租一个档位, 卖猪肉.
